ValidationErrors.digit: Password must contain at least 1 digit
ValidationErrors.special: Password must contain at least one special character (e.g., !@#$%^&*)
ValidationErrors.min: The password should be at least 8 symbols
ValidationErrors.name-uppercase: The name should start from uppercase letter
ValidationErrors.name-length: The name should be over 3 and less than 20 symbols
ValidationErrors.name-format: The name could consist of letters, digits and whitespaces
ValidationErrors.image-size: The image should be less than 50KB
ValidationErrors.image-too-big: This image too big, please use smaller

logout.error-no-msg: An unknown error occurred while logging out.

alena.name: Alena Pudina
alena.description: Team Lead | UI/UX Design | Automated Testing | Frontend Development
bio: Skilled Programmer with a Master's Degree in Applied Mathematics and Computer Science.
Excelled in Physics and Chemistry Olympiads during her School Years.
contributions: REST client application UI design implementation
Implemented a User authentication and registration system
Created robust Validation System for form inputs and user data.
Built API environment variables configuration interface with CRUD operations
Implemented API request history tracking with filtering and search functionality
Comprehensive unit test coverage for components and functionality
Conducted code reviews to foster successful collaboration among developers, significantly enhancing code quality by identifying and resolving issues.
Implemented a Router for page navigation and redirecting authorized/unauthorized users based on manual browser URL changes.

igor.name: Ihar Batura
bio: Natural-Born Leader with a Vision for Technical Innovation.
Extremely Talented & Skilled Frontend Developer with a Strong Work Ethic.
Collaborative Team Player Who Elevates Those Around Him and Amplifies Collective Success.
contributions: Architected and configured all project configuration files.
Next.js project initialization and configuration
Implementation of application routing structure
Light/dark theme toggle functionality
Multi-language support implementation
Developed product header component with navigation
Site footer component
REST API client interface page

yulia.name: Yulia Podgurskaia
bio: Trilingual Frontend Developer: English, Chinese, Russian.
Excelled in Math, Chemistry, Russian, English Olympiads and Music Competitions.
Received a Medal for Academic Excellence. Graduated with Two Diplomas with Honors.
contributions: Collaborated on UI/UX design system implementation.
Built several sections, pages and components.
Established comprehensive testing suite with 80%+ coverage using Jest and React Testing Library.
Conducted manual testing on multiple browsers and devices for reliability.

Greetings.title: Welcome
Greetings.descriptions: This is a browser-based REST Client with auth, history, variables, and multi-language support for streamlined API testing and development.
